articles.title: Atlassian cranks up the threat meter to max for Confluence authorization flaw - The Register
articles.description: Attackers secure admin rights after vendor said they could only steal data
articles.content:
Atlassian reassessed the severity rating of the recent improper authorization vulnerability in Confluence Data Center and Server, raising the CVSS score from 9.1 to a maximum of 10.
